name: The End of Time Diner
description:
Welcome to the End-of-Time Diner!

You are playing as a Diner owner in a futuristic space arcade game. Your main goal is to harvest and refine something, everyone desires, to sell it in your Diner: Time. 

To do so you pack your time-gun and travel into a black hole which leads you on a hostile space isle. There you have to collect your harvesters, 

look for time cracks around the island, harvest time from these and bring the harvested time to your refinery. Doing so needs to be done "just in time"

or your harvested time might collapse. While doing all of this you also have to avoid incoming comets and hostile time-keepers, inhabitating the isle.

Luckily you brought your time-gun, which can be refilled by collecting crystals lying around the isle.

If you think you have harvested enough time or its getting too dangerous around the isle you can always leave with your trusty rocket that you arrived with.

Controls: Move: W A S D Look around: Mouse Interact: E Jump: Space Sprint: Left Shift
